::Kluster::

Kluster blinks as the computer plays back Blur's message. Blur..... That name 
sounded familiar.

He replays the message, trying to sort out the words. After three replays, he 
sends a reply:

"This is Kluster, commander of the Maximal battle cruiser The Cybertronian 
Fire. I will send you the coordinates," he ends the message, sending the 
coordinates (in the savanah).
